summary: Changes the Spellbreaker to Light Armor from Heavy Armor
descriptionHtml:
follow me on steamcommunity : http://steamcommunity.com//profiles/76561198001009602/myworkshopfiles/

MOD DESCRIPTION:

It changes the Spellbreaker artifact from Heavy Armor to Light Armor. Made for who like me like to use light armors and are really interested in making usable the Spellbreaker. 

NOTE: I have installed \"Spellbreaker ward changer\" (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7421) by Templar-von-Midgard so bloc stats are different from vanilla.

VERSION:

**UPDATE** - Fixed name issue, translated from italian to english 

** 2.1 ** fixed for new patch. if you\'re using \"Spellbreaker ward changer\" it causes the shield to disappear but I have the same problem disabling my mod so \"Spellbreaker ward changer\" needs update.

This is the 2.0 version of this file because the 1.0 one wasn\'t working properly, now I\'ve tested it and it is fully working (as you see in screenshots)

KNOW ISSUES: 

now there shouldn\'t be any, but if you have installed \"Sellbreaker Ward Charger\" it my cause the artifact to be \"missing\". try to put that mod below in the load order or just deactivate it.

comment if you have any question or problem! :)
author: headshocked

files.name: Spellbreaker to Light Amor - English name Fix
files.fileName: Spellbreaker to Light Amor - English name Fix-11480-2-0.zip
